Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level   Y is your Influence Roll
Top Ability Rules: Exhaust a card. Add Y to each Defense or Attack roll you make
Bottom Ability Rules: Spend X to perform the following:     1) Add 25 feet to your movement    3) Attack target enemy, they cannot defend    5) Take an additional turn after this one

Top Ability Rules: Only this action can be played this turn. At start of next turn, recover all discarded cards, heal for X, and add X to defence values
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack target once this turn, again at start of next turn

Top Ability Rules: Make an Unarmed attack, add X to the Attack Value. If you deal damage Attack Target Enemy again. Target Enemy cannot use movement on their next turn.
Bottom Ability Rules: Make an Unarmed attack against an enemy. Lose X life. If you deal damage, you may choose to destroy one of their equipped weapons

Top Ability Rules: Lose X life. Take an extra turn after this turn ends and then lose X life again. After taking your extra turn, you must skip your next turn.
Bottom Ability Rules: Perform X non-action abilities, and lose 1 life for each one taken.

Top Ability Rules: Decide, layout, and expose the actions for your next turn. Everyone/everything around you knows your next turn. Recover X life, return X cards from discard, and add X to your next roll.
Bottom Ability Rules: During the next round, you may play either of your two actions at any point not during an active turn. At the end of that round, play any actions you have not already.

Top Ability Rules: Target area 5 feet by 5 feet. All Enemies in and adjacanet to that area cannot move more than 5 feet from targetted area unless they take and succeed an influence check against you.
Bottom Ability Rules: Target area 5 feet by 5 feet. Enemies cannot move onto or adjacent to the targetted area unless they make and succeed an influence roll against you.

Top Ability Rules: Target 5 by 5 foot area within 45 feet and jump to that location
Bottom Ability Rules: Target Ally within 45 feet and pull them adjacent to you.

Top Ability Rules: If you and a chosen ally attack the same enemy, return this card from discard, and both you and ally may return one card from discard
Bottom Ability Rules: If Target Ally heals or buffs you, add X to their value.

Top Ability Rules: Choose an ally within 15 feet, they may move to your location. Each of you may now move up to 10 feet.
Bottom Ability Rules: Copy targets next action if the action is valid with your equipment and skills, and then play it after targets turn ends.

Top Ability Rules: Create a summon on a 5 by 5 space. It has a range of 45 and an attack of X + Y. It's health is equal to your health at the time of casting. Discard a card.
Bottom Ability Rules: Swap places with a target summon. Gain 15 feet of movement

Top Ability Rules: Destroy target summon you control. Heal for X life. Return two cards from discard.
Bottom Ability Rules: Lose X life, target summon heals for X life.

Top Ability Rules: Roll influence if target is unwilling. Teleport target to a 5 by 5 surface. Exhaust a card.
Bottom Ability Rules: Mark 5 by 5 area. Teleport to target spot no matter the location

Top Ability Rules: Exhaust a card. Summon two doorways. Willing beings can walk through one to come out the other.
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card. Create a 10 by 10 by 10 box over a space. It has 50 hitpoints.

Top Ability Rules: If unwilling roll Influence. Push target up to 25 feet in a direction.
Bottom Ability Rules: If unwilling roll influence. Pull a target in your direction up to 25 feet.

Top Ability Rules: Set your life total to X. You cannot take damage from attacks.
Bottom Ability Rules: Double all Defense Values. You cannot make an attack.

Top Ability Rules: At the beginning of each of your turns, mark target enemy
Bottom Ability Rules: Remove mark from target enemy. Gain 20 feet of movement. Play two additional actions this turn.

Top Ability Rules: Heal adjacent Targets up to X hitpoints each
Bottom Ability Rules: While Active you can only play one action per turn, and target ally can play one additional action per turn.

Top Ability Rules: If X = 1, gain 50 ft. movement. If X = 2, attack target twice (if able). If X = 3, return all cards from discard and draw a card.
Bottom Ability Rules: For each mark on enemies, reduce their movement by 10 ft.

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage you may also disable the enemy
Bottom Ability Rules: If you deal damage you may instead disable the Target and take X damage. If they were already Disabled then they cannot remove this disabled affect.

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, instead grapple Target. Remove contact tokens on Target for the follow effects: Attack Token = add 1 RND to grapple duration; Defense Token = remove weapon from Target; Influence Token = remove action from Target's next turn
Bottom Ability Rules: If you deal damage and are at Range close then instead grapple Target Enemy and knock them Prone.

Top Ability Rules: If you succeed then Target Enemy gains a stack of Poison.
Bottom Ability Rules: If you deal damage to an enemy with an Attack they gain a stack of Poison.

Top Ability Rules: You gain a stack of Poison. Each time an enemy attacks you they gain a stack of Poison.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove all poison stacks from an Enemy. If you do, gain X life at the start of your next X turns

Top Ability Rules: At the start of your turn, you may Exhaust a card from your deck and return a card from Discard to your hand
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card and return three cards from discard to your hand

Top Ability Rules: Discard a card. Create a 1 by 5*X wall that is 15 feet high. It has 10 * X Health.
Bottom Ability Rules: Exhaust a card. Create a bomb consumable item that has an explosion radius of 10 feet, and has an Attack Value of 20.

Top Ability Rules: You may have up to two more active cards in play
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y = Active cards in play
Bottom Ability Rules: You have no limit on Active cards in play. Take Y damage at the end of your turn and discard a card.

Top Ability Rules: Add your Defense Die to your Attack Rolls
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y = Excess value from successful block
Bottom Ability Rules: If you block all damage from an attack then roll Y dice. If a number on the die is even the attacker takes 1 damage.

Top Ability Rules: If you successfully block all damage of the nest attack against you then heal for the remaining defense value
Bottom Ability Rules: Once per round if you block all of an attack made against you, you may return a card from discard to your hand

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage to a marked enemy you may remove that mark. If you remove the mark then each ally in range may make an attack against Target Enemy
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove a mark on Target Enemy at any time they make a roll value. If you do they must reroll that roll value; If they fail to succeed with this reroll then apply a mark to that Target Enemy

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage you may instead remove mark from Target Enemy. If you do then name an action they have taken and they cannot activate this action
Bottom Ability Rules: If you succeed you may remove a mark and name an action Target Enemy has performed. If you do they cannot activate this action

Top Ability Rules: If you succeed you may Mark Target. If Target is within 10 feet of another enemy, that enemy is then also Marked.
Bottom Ability Rules: If enemy is marked, add X to your attack roll. You may then remove Targets Mark and return this card to your hand.

Top Ability Rules: Roll X influence rolls and set those rolls aside. For each influence die set aside you may consume a token and then add an influence die to your roll.
Bottom Ability Rules: If a Target Enemy successfully blocks your attack, you may deal X damage to them.

Top Ability Rules: At the end of the next round roll a d4 for every successful attack you made and deal that much damage to Target Enemy
Bottom Ability Rules: If your attack succeeds you may choose to deal no damage to the Target Enemy you attacked, and instead deal that damage to another Target Enemy in range of that attack.

Top Ability Rules: Target Enemy takes 1d4 damage
Bottom Ability Rules: Target Enemy takes Xd4 in damage

Top Ability Rules: Add 1d4 to your attack. You may choose to remove dice from your attack roll and then remove that many dice from Target Enemies defense roll
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove one of your attack die from your attack roll; if you do, choose one of the enemies defense die and remove it from their defense roll and add it to your attack roll

Top Ability Rules: You may remove all attack die from your attack roll. If you do, remove all defense die from Targets defense roll
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove dice from your attack roll. If you do, deal 1 damage to Target Enemy for each die you removed

Top Ability Rules: If you succeed Target must make an attack against another Target if able. You may remove a mark to remove a influence die from their roll.
Bottom Ability Rules: If you succeed you may mark Target. If you do they Roll Influence against another Target of your choice, and if they succeed that target gets a mark. This repeats until an influence roll fails or no more new targets exist

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage to a Target, that Target gets -1 to all defense and attack rolls they make against you.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may move up to 20 feet if you are in your attack range after completing the movement. Attack Target Enemy.

Top Ability Rules: Remove a Mark and Discard a card. You may choose to reduce one of Targets die down one set to a minimum of a 1d4, or you may choose to halve Targets movement rounded up. This effect wears off when Target rests.
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card. Target Enemy must take an action to remove the net before they can use movement in an action.

Top Ability Rules: Each time you discard a card you may choose to instead loose X life and return that card to your hand.
Bottom Ability Rules: Create and throw X explosives, each one deals X + Y damage and has an affect radius of 5 feet from where they land.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level   Y is your Influence Roll
Top Ability Rules: Summon a totem. It heals a Target within 10 feet for Y at the end of each Round
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level Y is your Influence Roll
Bottom Ability Rules: Create a summon with Y health and attach it to Target. Whenever the Target makes a roll they may reduce the summons Life by 1 to add 1d4 to their roll value.
